attributes.action: non of the above box on ballot paper
attributes.additional_details:
At a general election I feel there should be a box which states that you are voting for non of the above.
This would be a true way of protesting and show your dissatisfication with the Political System that is now becoming antiquated. Not representing all the people.
The wealth that we have is being redistributed incorrectly.

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Petition Title: Abstaining

Created by: Brian Whicher

Closing: 30/03/2015
